    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void FilterByMonth()
      Checks the value of the WeekOrMonthSelect DatePicker and repopulates the Appointment TableView with all Appointments occurring in the month of the same name as the value selected
      void FilterByWeek()
      Checks the value of the WeekOrMonthSelect DatePicker and repopulates the Appointment TableView with all Appointments in the week following that date, inclusive to the date
      void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializer for Main form screen, checks User's system information on timezone and populates TableViews of all Appointments and Customers with start and end times adjusted to be shown at the User's local time
      void onAppointmentAddButtonAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Opens the AddAppointment screen where the User may populate the details of a new Appointment to be added to the list of all Appointments
      void onAppointmentDeleteButtonAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Passes the currently selected Appointment from the Appointment TableView to be deleted from the database, but first proffers a deletion confirmation to the User.
      void onAppointmentModifyButtonAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Passes the User's currently selected Appointment instance from the TableView to the ModifyAppointment View screen
      void onAppointmentsMonthlyRadioAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Upon selection of the Monthly Radio Button filter, calls the FilterByMonth() method
      void onAppointmentsNoFilterRadioAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Repopulates the Appointment TableView with all Appointments, no filter applied
      void onAppointmentsWeeklyRadioAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Upon selection of the Weekly Radio Button filter, calls the FilterByWeek() method
      void onConfirmButtonAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Confirms a deletion operation of a selected Customer or Appointment, and shows a confirmation message to the User confirming the deletion along with details of the deleted Customer/Appointment
      void onCustomerAddButtonAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Opens the AddCustomer screen where the User may populate the details of a new Customer to be added to the list of all Customers
      void onCustomerDeleteButtonAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Passes the currently selected Customer from the Customer TableView to be deleted from the database, but first proffers a deletion confirmation to the User.
      void onCustomerModifyButtonAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Passes the User's currently selected Customer instance from the TableView to the ModifyCustomer View screen
      void onDenyButtonAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Ends the deletion routine of a Customer or Appointment without performing any deletions
      void onExitButtonAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Reaction to User clicking Exit button, closes the application
      void onReportsButtonAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      When called, loads in viewReport.fxml as the current User-facing scene
      void onWeekOrMonthSelectAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Reacts to User selecting the Weekly or Monthly filter Radio Buttons and calls their respective filter methods
      void UpcomingAppointmentWarning()
      Shows a detailed message to the User in case of any Appointments upcoming for that User within 15 minutes of that User logging into the application, otherwise informs them there are no upcoming Appointments

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        Initializer for Main form screen, checks User's system information on timezone and populates TableViews of all Appointments and Customers with start and end times adjusted to be shown at the User's local time
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url - resource location pointer
        resourceBundle - target ResourceBundle to select key values from

      • UpcomingAppointmentWarning

        public void UpcomingAppointmentWarning()
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Shows a detailed message to the User in case of any Appointments upcoming for that User within 15 minutes of that User logging into the application, otherwise informs them there are no upcoming Appointments
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown in case of SQL database interaction issues

      • onExitButtonAction

        public void onExitButtonAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Reaction to User clicking Exit button, closes the application
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - User initiating button press

      • onCustomerDeleteButtonAction

        public void onCustomerDeleteButtonAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Passes the currently selected Customer from the Customer TableView to be deleted from the database, but first proffers a deletion confirmation to the User. Will not allow the deletion of a Customer with existing Appointments within the database and informs the User of that restriction if attempted.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - User initiating button press

      • onCustomerModifyButtonAction

        public void onCustomerModifyButtonAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Passes the User's currently selected Customer instance from the TableView to the ModifyCustomer View screen
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - User initiating button press
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown in case of fxml file interaction issues

      • FilterByWeek

        public void FilterByWeek()
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Checks the value of the WeekOrMonthSelect DatePicker and repopulates the Appointment TableView with all Appointments in the week following that date, inclusive to the date
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown in case of SQL database interaction issues
